question: Recently published figures show that the wildlife population around the world has decreased by around fifty percent over the last fifty years.What can we do to help protect the wildlife around the world.
text: Nowadays, the degradation of the natural environment is a pressing dilemma.Mankind should be the prime culprit for this action.Surveys have been reported regarding the deduction of wild animals.As a responsible people in the ,world there are a plethora of preventive measures we can act upon.

First and foremost,one of the major reasons for the deterioration of wildlife is the pollution of air,contaminated water and emission of carbonic substances through the usage of vehicles and factories.The substances that impact  the pollution might spread through water resources  and  air.As a result ,  all nations in the ei world need to await  deforestation and global warming.Because of this issue ,innumerable types of wild animals' lives can be diminished in an instant.Masses should avoid using harmful substances for daily needs,Moreover increasing the usage of public travelling systems might reduce the release of poisonous agents to the atmosphere.

Secondly and most importantly, the community should shift to using recyclable material for the sake of endangered species and other livings of the environment.A bag of plastic may sustain more than a hundred  years,and if some living thing consume it unknowingly it can be a reason for arising of life-threatening conditions for such animals.However, the death account always relies on the human.One's action might lead to significant damage unintentionally or knowingly.But the consequences need to pay by globally.

In conclusion,there are a flock of species facing death due to the action of human beings and the chemical industry.Conservation of wildlife all over the world is our primary responsibility .We can initiate it by increasing the usage of recyclable materials and avoiding releasing poisonous agents into the ecology will preserve each and every wildlife.
